docs.snippet: Singapore businessman Peter Lim has become the new majority owner of debt-ridden Valencia after buying 70.4 percent of the shares owned by the club's foundation, the Spanish club said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Singapore businessman Peter Lim has become the new majority owner of debt-ridden Valencia after buying 70.4 percent of the shares owned by the club's foundation, the Spanish club said on Saturday.

docs.snippet: Fired in the wake of a sexual-assault case involving Blue Devils players that turned out to be bogus, Mike Pressler has the lacrosse program at tiny Bryant University rolling in Division I....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fired in the wake of a sexual-assault case involving Blue Devils players that turned out to be bogus, Mike Pressler has the lacrosse program at tiny Bryant University rolling in Division I.
docs.abstract: Lacrosse coach Mike Pressler has steadily revived his shattered career in the wake of Duke University sexual-assault case that turned out to be bogus but cost him his job; now at tiny Bryant University, Pressler led its Division II team into Division I play in 2009, and has brought them to the playoffs in current season.

headline.main: Ex-Duke Lacrosse Coach Rebuilds Shattered Career
headline.print_headline: Ex-Duke Lacrosse Coach Rebuilds Shattered Career

docs.snippet: Residents and officials are just beginning to assess the damage and determine the causes, even as fire crews continued struggling to get five of the blazes under control....
docs.lead_paragraph: Residents and officials are just beginning to assess the damage and determine the causes, even as fire crews continued struggling to get five of the blazes under control.
docs.abstract: California residents are just beginning to assess damage and determine causes after 11 wildfires consume more 20,000 acres across San Diego County; fire crews continue to struggle to get five of the blazes under control.

headline.main: California Wildfires Spread Across Hills, Leveling Homes
headline.print_headline: California Wildfires Spread Across Hills, Leveling Homes

byline.contributor: Jennifer Medina contributed reporting from Los Angeles, and Henry Fountain from New York.

docs.snippet: If prime minister-elect Narendra Modi can revive a faltering economy, as his people clearly believe he can, India may finally be able to deal with overseas allies, foes and rivals from a position of strength....
